featured.text: What is the real reason many collectors want autographs?
Autograph dealers can be found in almost any sizable city, and collectors may get hundreds, even thousands, of dollars for things signed by anyone from Mozart to Madonna, Thomas Jefferson to JFK.
Some coins may command higher prices because they are more popular with collectors.

definition.en_def: A person who gathers or accumulates items of a particular type.
definition.example: The collector displayed his rare stamps at the exhibition.
